item.title: lunagirl add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: lunagirl add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "A lady's imagination is very rapid; it jumps from admiration to love, from love to matrimony in a moment." -- Jane Austen

item.title: lunagirl add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife." -- Jane Austen

item.title: lunagirl add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "Angry people are not always wise." -- Jane Austen

item.title: lunagirl add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: lunagirl add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: lunagirl add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: lunagirl add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: lunagirl add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: lunagirl add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: lunagirl add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: lunagirl add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: lunagirl add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: lunagirl add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: lunagirl add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak; courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: lunagirl add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "My tastes are simple: I am easily satisfied with the best." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: lunagirl add a quote by Winston Churchill
item.description: "You have enemies? Good. That means you've stood up for something, sometime in your life." -- Winston Churchill

item.title: lunagirl add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Never, never, never give in!" -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: lunagirl add a quote by F.E. Smith, Lord Birkenhead
lunagirl add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "I am fond of pigs. Dogs look up to us. Cats look down on us. Pigs treat us as equals." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: lunagirl add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "It is not enough that we do our best; sometimes we must do what is required." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: lunagirl add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "A lie gets halfway around the world before the truth has a chance to get its pants on." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: lunagirl add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "History will be kind to me for I intend to write it." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: lunagirl add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity; an optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty." -- Winston S. Churchill
